snippet: Jérôme Cahuzac, who is leading a crackdown on tax fraud, was told Tuesday that he would face a preliminary investigation into charges that he kept an illegal bank account abroad.
abstract: France's budget minister, Jerome Cahuzac, who is leading crackdown on tax fraud, will face preliminary investigation into charges that he committed tax fraud by keeping illegal bank account abroad.
lead_paragraph: Jérôme Cahuzac, who is leading a crackdown on tax fraud, was told Tuesday that he would face a preliminary investigation into charges that he kept an illegal bank account abroad.

headline.seo: France: Budget Minister Faces Inquiry on Foreign Bank Account
headline.main: France: Budget Minister Faces Inquiry on Foreign Bank Account
headline.print_headline: France: Budget Minister Faces Inquiry on Foreign Bank Account
